Topic.Title: Trade tycoon style game on quest?

Posts.EditableText: I was told in an earlier post that there are some games on here that are trade style games where I'm guessing the objective of the game is to become the best trader? Anyways I never got the link to any games like that and so I'm starting to wander if a game like that is even possible, I myself gave up on my idea for a trade game because the code for it was above my skill level, so if anyone knows of a game like the one i'm looking for please share the links to them here! Thanks in advance!

Posts.EditableText: Try checking on simulation games. I record there is a game named "El presidenté" which has to be inspired by "Tropico". You may find others like the one you seek. You are looking to do many different projects at same time. It will demand some research, and i hope Ravian Industries relies on a large work force.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for your help (I personally Love Tropico btw) and as for my company, i wouldnt exactly call it Large, but we have enough to have three projects going at the same time (we currently only have three text developers....)

Posts.EditableText:
errr... my bad for the confusion.

I had meant I know of some (non-quest) games that have some components of trade/economy games, as I don't think I've ever played a true trade/economy game, at least I'm unfamiliar with exactly what a trade/economy game is. My apologies for not being clear on this content of my previous post, and for not providing any links of such games.
